glitch.api.http

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • glitch.api.http.HttpRequest

  • public class HttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    HTTP Request created by {@link HttpClient#create(HttpMethod, String, Class)}. This is a ordinal Request Builder.
    Since:
    1.0
